ai-tha-ap468:1.2_0: aspiring to the level of the bad.
ai-tha-ap468:1.4_0: I keeping the best of cattle.
ai-tha-ap468:2.1_0: I see a fruit of good deeds,
ai-tha-ap468:2.4_0: and he gave it to the fruit.
ai-tha-ap468:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap468:3.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
ai-tha-ap468:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap468:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap468:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Night.
ai-tha-ap468:8.1_0: The sixth fruit of the senior monks.
